rows.label: tlk70000004_06_msg0001
rows.name:
Oh! It's you guys!
Do you have any idea what's going on?!

rows.label: tlk70000004_06_msg0002
rows.name:
For their own safety, I've had Torque the
weapon seller and Ellis the accessory
vendor hide in my inn.

rows.label: tlk70000004_06_msg0003
rows.name:
Look, I don't know if you're planning to
run, or stay and fight those bastards,
but feel free to rest at mine anytime!
